data.comment: Michael Salisbury starts the match. Watford with the kick-off in London.
Goal! Watford have got their heads in front thanks to a Ben Wilmot strike.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
It's QPR with the kick-off after the break.
The home team have replaced Lee Wallace with Niko Hamalainen. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
In the minute 46, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a first substitution, with Troy Deeney replacing Andre Gray.
Domingos Quina is replacing Joao Pedro for Watford at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Mark Warburton is making the team's second substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Lyndon Dykes replacing Macauley Bonne.
In the minute 56, The home team have replaced Dominic Ball with Chris Willock. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
At Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium, Ken Sema has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team replace Bright Osayi-Samuel with Albert Adomah.
In the minute 77, Ilias Chair grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Watford's Craig Cathcart has been booked in London.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 1-1.
